properties.entry: SELECT /**/ COUNT(*) FROM MG_QNA A WHERE A.QNA_DISPLAY = 'Y'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_STATUS , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.QNA_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.QNA_DISPLAY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.QNA_NO , B.QNA_STATUS , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.QNA_TITLE , B.QNA_BODY , B.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_ID , B.QNA_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.MODIFIED_DATE , B.QNA_DISPLAY FROM (SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_STATUS , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_ID , A.QNA_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.QNA_DISPLAY FROM MG_QNA A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.QNA_DISPLAY = 'Y' ORDER BY A.QNA_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MG_QNA A SET A.QNA_COUNT = (SELECT B.QNA_COUNT FROM MG_QNA B WHERE B.QNA_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.QNA_NO = ?

SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_ID , A.QNA_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.QNA_DISPLAY , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.FILE_TYPE , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM MG_QNA A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN MG_QNA_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.QNA_NO = C.REF_QNA_NO) WHERE A.QNA_DISPLAY = 'Y' AND A.QNA_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MG_QNA A ( A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
